title: What We Gonna Do About It
lyrics:
We three drink steep, we worked all week
Got the [?] wide open
And the dancefloor's empty (Yeah)
Damn that drummer's on a real good beat (Big bro)
And you know if I'm going
Then I'm takin' you with me



We got a choice, we gotta choose

At the end of the day we got nothin' to lose

Come on!



We've been waitin' on a night like this

On a night like this

To get right like this

We've been lookin' for a good excuse

Yeah a good excuse

To get a little loose, you know

We got the whole night

We got the moonlight

Ain't no better time than now, yeah

We've been waitin' on a night like this

On a night like this

So what we gonna do about it

What we gonna do about it

(Okay, okay, come on)



We goin' old school, we gonna sing

We gonna party like it's 1993
